sections.heading: sheet; requirements.Every signature sheet shall:(1) Contain the caption required in subdivision (1)(a) of section 18-2513;(2) Be part of a complete and authorized petition when presented to potential signatories; and(3) Comply with the requirements of section 32-628

sections.text:
18-2516.Signature sheet; requirements.

Every signature sheet shall:

(1) Contain the caption required in subdivision (1)(a) of section 18-2513;

(2) Be part of a complete and authorized petition when presented to potential signatories; and

(3) Comply with the requirements of section 32-628.

SourceLaws 1982, LB 807, ยง 16;Laws 1984, LB 1010, ยง 10;Laws 1994, LB 76, ยง 500.
